ygData.subject: RE: I give up
ygData.msgSnippet: While I like this idea (DE SK here), the Trolls and Ogres would scream bloody  murder. I agree though the task of finding something that would improve the
ygData.messageBody:
While I like this idea (DE SK here), the Trolls and Ogres would scream
bloody murder. I agree though the task of finding something that would
improve the DE/Humans but not overpower the Trolls/Ogres is near impossible.
Hmm didn't they just improve warriors?? Since they are made up of mixed
races what did they do to them, so that the larger races aren't overpowered?

So far here is how I see it.

Lifetap - Useless for the level we would get them (plus take away from the
damage I would be doing engaging the mob).
Harm Shields - Overbalancing for larger races and other classes have better
ones that are more effective anyway.
Additional Dot's - This might work (Give us back Boil blood and maybe Inf.
Cloud or something else).
Shields (Non Harm type - ala ShieldSkin) - At a lower level this would be
useful, also something past shield skin at the later levels.
ATK Enhancers - Would be nice..

Also what about criticals on 2hs?? Since the vast majority of SK's switch to
2handers at the later levels - I really liked how my MM shield and Cry.
Sword looked though..

Hmm..

Thom


-----Original Message-----
From: Steven E. Phipps [mailto:phipps@...]
Sent: Friday, September 17, 1999 1:33 PM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: [shadowknight] I give up


The only thing I can think of that would make the small race SK more viable,
without making the large race SK more powerful would be the introduction of
a few SK only items. (+hp items, or whatever) that are medium small only.
I see no way to up class power for one race and not the other. Only by Item
that large races cannot wear, that are SK only, do I see the possibility.


Morgul the Black
